Todays practice was really special and memorable for me. This is the 4th month I've been doing yoga with Adrienne 30 day challenges, and I've set the goal to do yoga with Adrienne for one year. And today was the strongest, most grounded, most centered I've ever felt on the mat. I started to have doubts about myself the last few days feeling like maybe I should be more advanced in my practice by now but today I felt the lesson surface that I am making progress, because I am coming to the mat everyday. And I am seeing that progress today. I was able to really pay attention to my center in every single move. And I'm finding that all the poses are becoming more healing than difficult. Poses like downward dog, or lunge, or even plank are becoming easier and more healing and rejuvenating than feeling like exercise. There's still very much more I will be improving on, and there are poses I still can't do or have trouble doing. But I know now that I am making major progress, and that feels HUGE!
